MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to dissemminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

Program_Info.Program_OS_Support: Mac OS X,Mac OS X 10.2,Mac OS X 10.3,Mac OS X 10.4,Mac OS X 10.5,Mac OS X 10.6,Mac OS X 10.7,Mac OS X 10.8

English.Keywords: game, memory, brain, mind, memorization, concentration, emo, emotion, emotional, emotive, affective, feelings, heart, love, family, friends, icon, picture, photo, avatar, contact, addressbook, Address Book, iChat, Widgets
English.Char_Desc_45: Emotional Memory game for the Mac
English.Char_Desc_80: EmoMemory trains your Emotional Memory, focusing on the people you love.
English.Char_Desc_250: EmoMemory is a memory game that will shake your heart. Instead of cards, numbers, symbols or figures, you'll concentrate on the people you love: family, best friends, colleagues, partners. Prepare your brain for an emotional memory experience.
English.Char_Desc_450: EmoMemory is a memory game that will shake your heart and train your Emotional Memory. Instead of memorizing cards, numbers, symbols or figures, you will concentrate on the people you love. Your family, your best friends, your colleagues, your partners. Free your heart's feelings and prepare your brain for an emotional memory experience.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
EmoMemory is a memory game that will shake your heart.
Instead of memorizing cards, numbers, symbols or figures, you will concentrate on the people you love. Your family, your best friends, your colleagues, your partners.
Free your heart's feelings and prepare your brain for an emotional memory experience.
** Use the registration code FREEGAME:D535DA to unlock the game.
